parse.title: The Standard Deviants: Rings, Kings and Things

wikitext.*:
'''''The Standard Deviants: Rings, Kings & Things''''' is an educational film released on [[18 June|June 18]], [[2002]], from a series called ''[[Wikipedia:Standard Deviants|Standard Deviants]]''. While not entirely devoted to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' it is used as the center piece and includes footage of Tolkien himself.

==Product description==
Prepare to enter an age when the world was ruled by wise kings, valiant warriors and terrifying monsters, and the power of magic united entire kingdoms. This is the world of ancient myths, heroic epic poems, and modern fantasy literature. Contains ''Swords & Sorcery'' and ''Monsters & Mayhem''.
